property.name: sqoop.server.port
property.description: The port the Sqoop server should listen on

property.name: sqoop.metastore.client.autoconnect.url
property.description: The JDBC URL for the metastore database

property.name: sqoop.metastore.client.autoconnect.username
property.description: The username for the metastore database

property.name: sqoop.metastore.client.autoconnect.password
property.description: The password for the metastore database

property.description: The maximum size of LOB data to inline during import (16MB)
